subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[嬨]]}} ''(Exception: Only for its {{w|CJK Compatibility Ideographs|compatibility ideograph}} U+FA81)'' * {{l|mul|[[滋]]}} ''(Exception: Only for its {{w|CJK Compatibility Ideographs|compatibility ideograph}} U+FA99)'' * {{l|mul|[[甆]]}} ''(Exception: Only for its {{w|CJK Compatibility Ideographs|compatibility ideograph}} U+FAA2)'' * {{l|mul|[[鶿]]}} ''(Exception: Only for its {{w|Hanja|Korean}} form. Contains {{l|mul|兹}} in other regions)'' * {{l|mul|[[螆]]}} ''(Exception: Only for its {{w|Japanese}} form. Contains {{l|mul|茲}} in Taiwan/Hong Kong and {{l|mul|兹}} in mainland China)''

subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* <big>{{l|mul|[[茲]]}}</big> ''(Orthodox form when ''<big>玆</big>'' is used as a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant form}} - Refer [[玆#Etymology 2|Etymology 2]])''
* <big>{{l|mul|[[兹]]}}</big> ''({{w|Variant Chinese character|Variant form}} of {{l|mul|茲}}, also the preferred form used in mainland China)''
